document.full_text: a jury in the underage sex trial of outspoken former united nations weapons inspector scott ritter on tuesday watched a nude video of him sent over the internet to a person he thought was a 15-year-old girl.
document.title: sex trial of former u.n. weapons inspector opens
lines_and_colors: a jury in the underage sex trial of outspoken former united nations weapons inspector scott ritter on tuesday watched a nude video of him sent over the internet to a person he thought was a 15-year-old girl.
